title: Glossy and Shiny
detail_text: <:th_ch0108/>Welcome to Hotel Ohara~! Today is the day where you can get a beauty treatment trial! Want to try it, Kotori?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Beauty treatment....? Is that the one where they give facial massage and stuff?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Ye~s! It feels really good, you know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>I’m a bit curious about it.... My mom does it sometimes. Is it really okay?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Of course!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>B-, but, is it okay for high schoolers to do that kind of thing?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>It’s fine~. Mari will also have it next to you, so♪ You just pick the aroma oil you want, and then you’ll be blanketed by its scent~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Then, I want to try it! Aroma oil, huh.... What kind of scent will it have?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0108/>Apparently, the relaxing effects are different depending on the scent. Let’s pick it together. After the trial treatment, our skin will be all glossy and shiny, Kotori~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Uwaaah....! I want to become glossy and shiny and surprise Honoka-chan and Umi-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
